t: What is Brand Registry and how does it work in Canada?
s: To qualify for Amazon Brand Registry enrollment, all you need is a fully-registered or pending trademark. To become a registered brand, you need an active registered text-based or image-based trademark in each country you plan to enroll (and sell) in. Brand Registry may also consider brands with pending registrations under specific trademark offices (check country-specific requirements...
